Currently in Da Lat, the area of

many patients also encounter side effects
during radiotherapy. To limit
this, a group of British, French and Dutch doctors
sought the support of artificial intelligence.
Side effects that
breast cancer treatment patients often experience are
skin changes, scarring, lymphedema,
arm pain, swelling, and even heart damage
due to radiation therapy. An international research team has
designed a  artificial intelligence tool who
can predict which breast cancer patients
are at higher risk of side effects
after treatments including surgery and
radiotherapy tools who are trained to
predict lymph side effects up to  3 years after
surgery and radiotherapy using
